Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, just north of the Rosecrest Street intersection.
Room.LongDescription: Darby Reynold's shipbuilding offices are located east of Oceanview Drive. For a considerable sum of money, just about any ship may be custom built for the discriminating customer. There is a loud, partying-type noise coming from the building to the west. It appears to be some sort of cantina, but there's no entrance on this side of the building.
